title: Episode 1: The Genesis of Blockchain
description: In this episode, Meta-David explores the origins of blockchain technology and its impact on the digital world.

title: Episode 2: Decentralized Future
description: Meta-David discusses the potential of a decentralized internet and what it means for privacy and security.

title: Episode 3: Smart Contracts Simplified
description: A deep dive into smart contracts: how they work and why they are the backbone of DeFi.

title: Episode 4: Navigating the NFT Space
description: Meta-David shares insights on the NFT craze and how to separate the signal from the noise.
